source.name: Exercise 16
source.instructions: If this were an online order fulfillment company, the might be interested in items that were frequently part of small orders (in terms of the number of items in the order) because these orders have a disproportionately high shipping cost per item. Accordingly, write a stored procedure, named spGetItemsSmOrders, that takes as an input an items category (e.g., book or movie) and outputs all items in that category that were ordered in orders with only that item in the order. Output the item id, its description, its price, and how many small orders contained that item as the only item (use num_orders for this field name). Output the data in DESCending order of the number of items.
